Source.Name: inotify-tools
Source.Summary: inotify-tools is a C library and a set of command-line programs for Linux providing a simple interface to inotify.
Source.Description:
command-line programs providing a simple interface to inotify. inotify-tools is a set of command-line programs for Linux providing a simple interface to inotify. These programs can be used to monitor and act upon filesystem events. inotify-tools consists of two utilities:
inotifywait simply blocks for inotify events, making it appropriate for use in shell scripts.
inotifywatch collects filesystem usage statistics and outputs counts of each inotify event.
